<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|compound|entity}}: An entity, including the entity id.
*** {{nbt inherit/entity|indent=******}}
** {{nbt|compound|custom_spawn_rules}}: Optional custom fields to override spawning requirements.
*** {{nbt|int|block_light_limit}}: Can either be a single value, or a compound containing min_inclusive and max_inclusive. Overrides the block light check when spawning the entity.
*** {{nbt|int|sky_light_limit}}: Can either be a single value, or a compound containing min_inclusive and max_inclusive. Overrides the sky light check when spawning the entity.
** {{nbt|compound|equipment}}: Optional. Determines the equipment the entity will wear.
*** {{nbt|string|loot_table}}: Resource location of a loot table to use to generate the equipment
*** {{nbt|float}}{{nbt|compound|slot_drop_chances}}: Optional. When a {{nbt|float}} determines the drop chances for every slot. When a {{nbt|compound}}, controls the drop chances per slot.
**** {{nbt|float|feet}}: Optional. Drop chance of the boots.
**** {{nbt|float|legs}}: Optional. Drop chance of the leggings.
**** {{nbt|float|chest}}: Optional. Drop chance of the chestplate.
**** {{nbt|float|head}}: Optional. Drop chance of the helmet.
**** {{nbt|float|body}}: Optional. Drop chance of the body armor.
**** {{nbt|float|mainhand}}: Optional. Drop chance of the weapon in the main hand.
**** {{nbt|float|offhand}}: Optional.  Drop chance of the weapon in the off hand.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
